item.title: By: Google Drive for iPhone and iPad gets spreadsheet editing; Google Chrome gets Passbook support | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Google Drive for iPhone and iPad gets spreadsheet editing; Google Chrome gets Passbook support | Deemable Tech
item.description: [...] big update tonight came in the Google Drive app. When the Google Drive app was originally released it was depressingly limited in its capabilities. Other than renaming and deleting files it was basically useless. Recently the Google Drive app [...]
